text:
Dear All,

i have done load balancing with apache2 and tomcat6

i have done it through mod_jk.so connector

all is working fine

but when i do the load testing with JMETER , it getting slower and slower, the page is taking a bit time to display


regards

subhasish sahu
creator: subhasish23@gmail.com

text: Bugzilla is no User support forum. It is for reporting bugs against httpd. Your problem description is very generic. Please go to the appropriate user mailing lists for httpd and more likely Tomcat to get help.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
